channel.title: The ABIS Podcast
channel.description: The ABIS is a weekly look into the world of music, movies, theme parks and Horror. Tune in and Geek out with the latest news, reviews, and interviews with Celebs, Theme Park Insiders, and anyone else that we think is Awesomely Bad.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Official Podcast of AwesomeBadness.com
channel.itunes:author: Erik yates
channel.itunes:summary: The ABIS is a weekly look into the world of music, movies, theme parks and Horror. Tune in and Geek out with the latest news, reviews, and interviews with Celebs, Theme Park Insiders, and anyone else that we think is Awesomely Bad.

item.title: Manta
item.description: We team up with Behind the Thrills to bring you the grand opening of Manta!
item.dc:creator: Erik yates
item.itunes:summary: We team up with Behind the Thrills to bring you the grand opening of Manta!

item.title: The ABIS Episode 22: Complaints and Grievances
item.description: After the crap that was last weeks show, we have a few things to get off our chest. So this week we have a good old fashioned bitch fest. Have something on your mind? Call us up and tell us about it!347-237-5266 We bitch about the things that we hate in society, movies, music, and theme parks. You never know whats going to come up, and what we're going to say, When you Step Into The ABIS.
item.dc:creator: Erik yates

item.title: The ABIS Episode 20: Valentines Day? PHOOEY!
item.description: This week on The ABIS, BSquare and Erik devote the whole show to love. And how to screw it up! Join us as we talk about the darker side of Valentines Day, love lost, and how to deal with getting completely crapped on. And to show you that we're not completely bitter old jerks, we talk a bit about how to romance your special someone, and yes it does include theme parks! All this and more when you Step Into the ABIS.
item.dc:creator: Erik yates

All this and more when you Step Into the ABIS.

item.title: The ABIS Episode 19: The Boob's Tube
item.description: This week on the ABIS, we have an old friend stop by. Our good friend and previous co-host of other shows, Matticus pops in for a little co-host duty this week. We fall back into old times of gay and fart jokes and have a good time talking about all the TV that's happening, and all the TV that we miss. You dont want to miss this and more when You Step Into the ABIS.
item.dc:creator: Erik yates

You dont want to miss this and more when You Step Into the ABIS.

item.title: The ABIS Episode 18:Inauguration-We're screwed
item.description: This week on The ABIS we are part of the historic day as we welcome in President Obama to the White House. We also ramble a bit, and talk about the current state of the union. Of course its not serious! It's us! All this and more when you Step into the ABIS.
item.dc:creator: Erik yates
item.itunes:summary: This week on The ABIS we are part of the historic day as we welcome in President Obama to the White House. We also ramble a bit, and talk about the current state of the union. Of course its not serious! It's us! All this and more when you Step into the ABIS.

item.title: The ABIS Episode 17: 2009 The Year We Suck!
item.description: This week on The ABIS, we take a look at the year ahead and the things we're looking forward to. We also take a step back, and look at the absolute worst of 2008 and why we say good riddance. We also take our own special look at what we expect from 2009, and why it's going to suck.
item.dc:creator: Erik yates
item.itunes:summary: This week on The ABIS, we take a look at the year ahead and the things we're looking forward to. We also take a step back, and look at the absolute worst of 2008 and why we say good riddance. We also take our own special look at what we expect from 2009, and why it's going to suck.

item.title: The ABIS Episode 16: A Very BAD Christmas
item.description: This week on the ABIS, we celebrate Christmas the only way we can....badly. We do our first all pre-recorded show, and do things a little differently. We unwrap presents, play some Christmas songs, and heck, Erik even tells a Christmas story. And of course, we're doing it, so you know its just plain wrong. Merry Christmas, from all of us at The ABIS.
item.dc:creator: Erik yates

Merry Christmas, from all of us at The ABIS.

item.title: The ABIS Episode 15: What's a Mannheim Steamroller?
item.description: This week on the ABIS we are honored to welcome back Michael Roddy as he talks all about Grinchmas, Macy's Day, and working with Mannheim Steamroller, and yes, we do talk a little HHN. We also talk about other parks and what they do for the Holidays. All this and more When you Step Into the ABIS.

item.title: The ABIS Episode 14:You'll Shoot Your Eye Out!
item.description: This week on the ABIS we take a look at not only our favorite Christmas movies, but we also take a look at Christmas Specials that have touched our hearts. Yes Virginia....There is a Santa Claus! All that and more when you Step Into The ABIS.
item.dc:creator: Erik yates

item.title: The ABIS Episode 13:We Can Be Happy Underground
item.description: This week on The ABIS, We talk about music. The internet has brought about a new age of music, and has thrust several new artists in the limelight. We talk to three musicians about their music, all about their influences, and the direction that music is taking. Join us as we chat with Nick Strong, Mikey G and The Hard Richards. Also be on the look out for an extra special Bonus Track in the next few days with the music from all three artists...All when you Step into The ABIS.
item.dc:creator: Erik yates
item.itunes:summary: This week on The ABIS, We talk about music. The internet has brought about a new age of music, and has thrust several new artists in the limelight. Also be on the look out for an extra special Bonus Track in the next few days with the music from all three artists...All when you Step into The ABIS.

item.title: The ABIS Episode 12:Happy Thanksgiving Bitches!
item.description: Happy Thanksgiving from all of us hear at The ABIS. We hope you had a great one. In celebration, we talk turkey, we also talk about Scott's visit to IAAPA, and we talk about some great gift ideas...and in true ABIS fashion, who else could stop by but the man himself...could it be.....SATAN? You want to hear it, its wrong, its funny and its the only thing we could come up with. All when you Step Into the ABIS.

item.title: The ABIS Episode 11:Mud Madness and Manta
item.description: This week on the ABIS we take a stop to talk about theme parks. We have a pre-recorded interview from the Manta Construction tour, so live you can hear the hammers. We also talk to an Ambassador from IAAPA, and yes we even announce our secret from last week! All this and more when you step into the ABIS.
item.dc:creator: Erik yates

item.title: The ABIS Episode 10:The Fall Movie Preview
item.description: This week on the ABIS we talk movies. We love movies, and this is a great time of year to love movies with all kinds of Family Holiday Fare and Oscar Contendors. We also talk about the death of Michael Crichton with our own special little tribute. And we tease on a huge announcement...that we never get to.
item.dc:creator: Erik yates

item.title: Episode 9:Bsquare for President
item.description: This week on The ABIS, we wrap up the haunt season with talk about Halloween Horror Nights at Universal, Netherworld in Atlanta, ane the Collective. We also nominate Bsquare for President, drop a bunch of calls, and keep track of who will be the next President. All this and more when you Step Into The Abis.
item.dc:creator: Erik yates
item.itunes:summary: This week on The ABIS, we wrap up the haunt season with talk about Halloween Horror Nights at Universal, Netherworld in Atlanta, ane the Collective. We also nominate Bsquare for President, drop a bunch of calls, and keep track of who will be the next President. All this and more when you Step Into The Abis.

item.title: Episode 8:This is Halloween
item.description: This week on The ABIS, Haunt season is almost over. Halloween is upon us, and wow...we do the worst show ever. It's just Scott and myself as everyone else recupirates from a great show last week, and long drives home. We have a "special" opening as Scott shows you just what Rocky Horror Picture Show is all about. We also talk the origins of Halloween, Sea Beans and we have Sharon and Marcia on from Journey Paranormal Society on talking about their event happening on Halloween on a haunted Aircraft carrier, paranormal experiences and shadow people. It's really cool stuff, and a lot of fun. You want to check it out this week as yes it is Awesome, but it is most certainly Bad and its a hell of a lot of fun when you Step into the ABIS.
